subject: CIVE
title: Numerical Methods in Geomechanics
description: Theoretical basis of numerical modeling in geomechanics; constitutive relationships and failure models for soils and rocks; numerical implementation of constitutive models in finite element and finite difference computer codes; engineering applications in areas of embankment and slope stability, mining, tunneling, soil and structure interaction.  The course is structured to provide theorectical understanding and hands-on expericence with geotechnical analyses using FLAC3D computer code.
